name: Bouncy Bot
description:
Boing boing! You bounce off everything!! Can you make it through past the sentries?

This is you. You bounce off barrels, crates, goals and sentries as you move around.

This is a barrel. All barrels in a level must end up on one of the goal markers.

This is a crate. Crates go on carts on goal markers.

 This is a cart, carts are pulled around by you and latch on to a goal markers.

This is the goal marker, guide the barrels, crates and carts to it.

This is the Sentry. They pull on crates and barrels and bounce off you. 

These are Gears, moving Counter-Clockwise and Clockwise respectively. They shift objects next to them over one space.

The game itself is a bit buggy, make sure you don't get pinned between a Goal and anything else. I tried to fix it, but couldn't figure out how.
